title: Type - Phone
description: Type representation of a phone number

phone_type.description: Type of phone number (e.g. mobile, home or business)

phone_number.description: A valid phone number string in ITU E.123 international notation (e.g. +123 123 456 7890). An extension number, if applicable, should be separated by words ''extension'' or ''ext.'' after the phone number (e.g. +123 123 456 7890 ext. 100).
